amendment.description: Amendment strikes language in the bill which terminates in 2021 the requirement that ICBM silos remain in at least warm status.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in House Report 113-455 to strike subsection (c) of Section 1634 of the reported NDAA, which terminates in 2021 the requirement that ICBM silos remain in at least warm status.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Daines amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 196 (Roll no. 227).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Daines amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 196 (Roll no. 227).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Daines.
